title: Please help! My game has shrinked!
body:
After loading into the game, I alt+tab out as per usual to check up on reddit and other social sites. As I try to tab back in, my game has suddenly shrinked. I've tried multiple methods (alt+enter) and checking the game's properties, but I just can't seem to get it fixed.

Would appreciate it if anyone here had any insight as to what has happened to my game, lol.

http://i.imgur.com/WNAj2wh.png <- link to the image

replies.body:
This issue is typically caused by one or more settings in your in-game preferences being corrupt. A quick reset of those settings can usually resolve this. 

First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these two files, leave the match, then hop into another custom match with bots to ensure the fix has worked. 

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
